author: Anonymous
content: Sell everything and buy bitcoin. It is the safest in this market environment.

author: AMY
content: Good company, but horrible stock. Been holding for a few years and finally sold all of it (made a small profit) to free up some funds to invest in other companies. So far for this year, it has delivered an underwhelming return of less than half of S&P Index. Not sure why this is part of the Mag 7, but I'm glad I've moved on.

author: Mark
content: Bullish: MSFT is undervalued. Start accumulating if you don't have a position.

author: Keep Florida Free!
content: Bullish: Rough day but we will see a bounce back tomorrow

author: Neanderthal
content: Bullish: Adding to my position of Microsoft today !
